column1: Traffic reports will resume Tuesday August 27 at 4:00 p.m.

column3: TRAFFIC ALERT FOR NEW CIRCLE RD AT N BROADWAY:
column4: The outer loop is shut down due to a serious collision involving a motorcyclist.

column3: TRAFFIC ALERT FOR NEW CIRCLE RD AT N BROADWAY:
column4: Traffic is being diverted to the gas station parking lot.

column3: TRAFFIC ALERT FOR NEW CIRCLE RD AT N BROADWAY:
column4: Motorists should avoid the outer loop of New Circle Rd between Old Paris Rd and N Broadway if possible.
